subConfigs.name: CWDTEN
optionDescription: 0 = Window Watchdog Timer Enabled when chip is powered on.
1 = Window Watchdog Timer Disabled when chip is powered on.

subConfigs.name: CWDTPDEN
optionDescription: 0 = Watchdog Timer clock kept enabled when chip enters Power-down.
1 = Watchdog Timer clock is controlled by OSC10K_EN (PWRCON[3]) when chip enters Power-down.

subConfigs.name: CKF
optionDescription: 0 = XT1 clock filter Disabled.
1 = XT1 clock filter Enabled.

subConfigs.name: CGPFMFP
optionDescription: 0 = GPF[1:0] work as GPIO
1 = GPF[1:0] work as external 4~24MHz crystal pin

subConfigs.name: CFOSC
subConfigs.description: CPU Clock Source Selection After Reset
optionDescription: 000 = External 4~24 MHz high speed crystal clock.
111 = Internal RC 22.1184 MHz high speed oscillator clock.

subConfigs.name: CBODEN
optionDescription: 0 = Brown-out detect Enabled after powered on.
1 = Brown-out detect Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: CBORST
optionDescription: 0 = Brown-out reset Enabled after powered on.
1 = Brown-out reset Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: LDWPEN
optionDescription: 0 = LDROM (16KB) write-protected enabled.
1 = LDROM (16KB) write-protected disable.

subConfigs.name: CIOINI
optionDescription: 0 = All GPIO set as input tri-state mode after power on.
1 = All GPIO set as Quasi bi-direction mode after chip power on.

subConfigs.name: CBS
optionDescription: 00 = APROM can be updated in this mode.
01 = Chip booting from LDROM.
10 = Chip booting from APROM.
11 = Chip booting from APROM and program executing range only including APROM.

subConfigs.name: LOCK
optionDescription: 0 = Flash data is not locked.
1 = Flash data is locked for writer, ICE and ICP.

subConfigs.name: DFEN
optionDescription: 0 = Data Flash Enabled.
1 = Data Flash Disabled.
